EmailTemplate.subject: Smarter, More Accurate Flight Planning from Honeywell GoDirect is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
New flight planning technology from Honeywell is computing faster, more accurate flight plans to help you accomplish your mission. GoDirect™ Flight Planning <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning]]> makes life easier by connecting pilots and dispatchers with air traffic control information, airport alerts and real-time weather information. Now, new software calculates the ideal flight plan in as little as one minute, and displays multiple routes in seconds.
- Save time with faster speeds when computing a flight plan and direct routes. - Improve efficiency with route overlays, mapping and tracking to plan routes that match your goals. - Reduce costs with plans that more accurately track fuel consumption. - Increase accuracy with higher cleared-as-filed rates with air traffic control. - Enhance flexibility with active flight tracking provided by a flight data specialist who provides weather, hazard and other updates throughout your flight.
GoDirect Flight Planning and our electronic flight bag application GoDirect Flight Bag Pro <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> put everything you need to create and file the perfect flight plan at your fingertips. Whether you’re flying across the state, across the country or over the ocean, GoDirect gives you the right tools for the job.
GET STARTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning]]>
